article_title: Republican Obsession With Obama And Clinton Is An Impoverishing Attitude Of Thought

article_metadata.description: In suggesting that President Obama is 'ruining' the country, Republicans are insulting very capable Americans, all the while handing an undeserving president a very big compliment.
article_metadata.author: John Tamny
